t: Amazon.com: MD Artisan Razor : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I use this razor to edge my beard and it does a good job. It comes with a ton of blades too. Gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is a little difficult to open the razor and change the blades. This isn't a knock against MD Barber, this is just how this design works for all manufacturers.
